style.palette: limited palette, earthy with cool accents
style.linework: no outlines; define shapes with color contrast
style.notes: Match existing scene-1-coronado mood; prioritize crisp silhouettes and flat color planes.

global_constraints: No characters or readable text in backgrounds.
Keep center area relatively open for player movement.
Avoid high-frequency noise; favor large shapes.
Leave edges slightly darker to frame the play area.

prompt.summary: Top-down courtyard with moving boxes and a small path toward a house.
prompt.setting: Compact outdoor yard with stone path, patches of grass, a few bushes, and a hint of house wall on the right edge.
prompt.composition: Open central rectangle area for pushing boxes; path runs diagonally from lower-left to upper-right; a subtle fence line at top edge.
props: Stacked crates area (empty space in center, no actual boxes drawn)
Low shrubs, a small tree in corner, scattered stones
Short fence or gate silhouette at top
prompt.lighting: late afternoon warm light, gentle shadows toward bottom-right
prompt.color_notes: cool greens and warm browns; keep saturation moderate

prompt.summary: Top-down construction site with blueprint markings and a clear build zone.
prompt.setting: Open lot with dirt ground, faint grid or chalk outline in center, tools on the edges.
prompt.composition: Large empty center for build zone; tool clusters and lumber stacks in corners; subtle boundary with stones.
props: Wood planks and beams at edges
Toolbox, hammer, sawhorse silhouettes
Blueprint chalk outline as faint lines (non-text)

prompt.summary: Top-down small interior entryway with a door and warm light.
prompt.setting: Interior room with wood floor, a door on the right wall, a small rug near center.
prompt.composition: Open floor space in center; door at right edge; a small table or coat rack near top.
props: Rug or mat in center
Coat rack or small table near top-left
Wall baseboards with subtle highlights
prompt.color_notes: warm browns and amber; low contrast

prompt.summary: Top-down forest clearing with a potion altar area and soft mystical vibe.
prompt.setting: Clearing with mossy ground, a circular stone patch in the center.
prompt.composition: Open center circle; dense foliage at edges; a small stream or rock line at bottom-left.
props: Stone circle in center
Mossy rocks and fallen log on one side
Subtle glowing mushrooms near edges (no text)
prompt.lighting: cool twilight with soft teal highlights
prompt.color_notes: deep greens, cool blues, gentle teal glows

prompt.summary: Top-down forked path with two lanes, upper and lower.
prompt.setting: Stone path split into two arcs across the scene; grassy field around.
prompt.composition: Two broad horizontal lanes; center area clear; subtle markers at ends.
props: Path stones with soft edges
Low grass tufts and a couple of signposts without text
Small flowers or stones near corners

prompt.summary: Top-down narrow path leading to a sacred area.
prompt.setting: Long path through darker terrain; slight vignette at edges.
prompt.composition: Path runs left to right; open center; darker borders create focus.
props: Stone markers at sides
Sparse shrubs and rocky edges
Subtle rune-like patterns on stones (no readable text)
prompt.lighting: dim with focused highlight on center path
prompt.color_notes: dark olive, slate, pale gold accents

prompt.summary: Top-down altar clearing with a focal platform.
prompt.setting: Circular altar area with symmetrical stone pattern.
prompt.composition: Altar at right-center; open space leading to it; faint radial stone ring.
props: Altar platform with steps
Stone ring or petals around
Torch bases without flame detail
